h1_title: The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm
content: Head up the slope full of Frozen Corpses to the large forested area full of rocks. A golden trail will soon appear leading straight ahead and up a broken stairway to the Warding Temple on the hill, but there's an optional area to consider first off to the left.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Pagoda_Realm_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm', specifically from the subsection 'Snow-Veiled Trail'.
The content is as follows:
Head up the slope full of Frozen Corpses to the large forested area full of rocks. A golden trail will soon appear leading straight ahead and up a broken stairway to the Warding Temple on the hill, but there's an optional area to consider first off to the left.
